name: system-notification-entity-updated
description: System default template for entity update notifications
templateBody:
{{event.userName}} changed {{camelCaseToTitle event.entityType}}: {{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}

{{#with (groupEventChanges event.changeDescription) as |changes|}}{{#if (and (eq event.entityType 'testCase') (hasFieldInChanges changes 'testCaseResult'))}}Execution result: {{#if (eq entity.testCaseStatus 'Success')}}‚úÖ Passed{{else if (eq entity.testCaseStatus 'Failed')}}‚ùå Failed{{else if (eq entity.testCaseStatus 'Aborted')}}‚ö†Ô∏è Aborted{{else if (eq entity.testCaseStatus 'Queued')}}‚è≥ Queued{{else}}{{entity.testCaseStatus}}{{/if}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.timestamp}} at {{formatDate entity.testCaseResult.timestamp}}{{/if}}

üìã Test Case Information:
    {{#if entity.owners}}
  • Owners: {{#each entity.owners}}{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.tags}}
  • Tags: {{#each (pluck entity.tags 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.domains}}
  • Domains: {{#each entity.domains}}{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.severity}}
  • Severity: {{entity.severity}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.entityFQN}}
  • Related Table: {{entity.entityFQN}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.testDefinition.name}}
  • Test Definition: {{entity.testDefinition.name}}{{#if entity.testDefinition.description}}
    {{{entity.testDefinition.description}}}{{/if}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.parameterValues}}
  • Configuration: {{#each entity.parameterValues}}{{name}}: {{value}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}
üîç Execution Summary:
    {{#if (or entity.testCaseResult.minBound entity.testCaseResult.maxBound)}}
  • Bounds: {{#if entity.testCaseResult.minBound}}min: {{entity.testCaseResult.minBound}}{{/if}}{{#if (and entity.testCaseResult.minBound entity.testCaseResult.maxBound)}}, {{/if}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.maxBound}}max: {{entity.testCaseResult.maxBound}}{{/if}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.testResultValue}}
  • Test Results: {{#each entity.testCaseResult.testResultValue}}{{name}}: {{value}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.passedRows}}
  • Passed Rows: {{entity.testCaseResult.passedRows}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.passedRowsPercentage}} ({{entity.testCaseResult.passedRowsPercentage}}%){{/if}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.failedRows}}
  • Failed Rows: {{entity.testCaseResult.failedRows}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.failedRowsPercentage}} ({{entity.testCaseResult.failedRowsPercentage}}%){{/if}}
    • {{/if}}
{{#if (or (eq entity.testCaseStatus 'Failed') (eq entity.testCaseStatus 'Aborted'))}}üî¨ Failure Investigation:
    {{#if entity.testCaseResult.result}}
  • Details:
    {{entity.testCaseResult.result}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.failedRowsSample}}
  • Failed Rows Sample:
    {{entity.failedRowsSample}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.testCaseResult.sampleData}}
  • Sample Data:
    {{entity.testCaseResult.sampleData}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.inspectionQuery}}
  • Inspection Query:
    {{entity.inspectionQuery}}
    • {{/if}}
{{/if}}
{{else if (and (eq event.entityType 'dataContract') (hasFieldInChanges changes 'dataContractResult'))}}{{#if (eq entity.latestResult.status 'Success')}}‚úÖ Data Contract Validation Passed{{else if (eq entity.latestResult.status 'Failed')}}‚ùå Data Contract Validation Failed{{else if (eq entity.latestResult.status 'Aborted')}}‚ö†Ô∏è Data Contract Validation Aborted{{else if (eq entity.latestResult.status 'PartialSuccess')}}‚ö†Ô∏è Data Contract Validation Partially Succeeded{{else}}üîÑ Data Contract Validation Running{{/if}}{{#if entity.latestResult.timestamp}} at {{formatDate entity.latestResult.timestamp}}{{/if}}
{{#if (or entity.entityStatus entity.entity)}}
üìã Contract Information:
    {{#if entity.displayName}}
  • Name: {{entity.displayName}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.entityStatus}}
  • Status: {{entity.entityStatus}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.entity}}
  • Applied to {{camelCaseToTitle entity.entity.type}}: {{entity.entity.fullyQualifiedName}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if (gt (length entity.owners) 0)}}
  • Owners: {{#each entity.owners}}{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if (gt (length entity.reviewers) 0)}}
  • Reviewers: {{#each entity.reviewers}}{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}
{{/if}}{{#if (or (eq entity.latestResult.status 'Failed') (eq entity.latestResult.status 'Aborted') (eq entity.latestResult.status 'PartialSuccess'))}}{{#each changes.updates}}{{#if (eq name 'dataContractResult')}}üî¨ Failure Investigation:
{{#if newValue.schemaValidation}}
  • Schema Validation ({{newValue.schemaValidation.passed}}/{{newValue.schemaValidation.total}}) {{#if (eq newValue.schemaValidation.failed 0)}}‚úÖ{{else}}‚ùå{{/if}}{{#if (gt newValue.schemaValidation.failed 0)}}
    Failed columns:
      {{#each newValue.schemaValidation.failedFields as |field|}}
    • {{field}}
      • {{/each}}
    {{/if}}
{{/if}}{{#if newValue.semanticsValidation}}
  • Semantics Validation ({{newValue.semanticsValidation.passed}}/{{newValue.semanticsValidation.total}}) {{#if (eq newValue.semanticsValidation.failed 0)}}‚úÖ{{else}}‚ùå{{/if}}
    {{#if (eq newValue.semanticsValidation.failed 0)}}All semantic rules validated successfully.{{else}}
      {{#each (limit newValue.semanticsValidation.failedRules 5)}}
    • {{ruleName}}
      • {{/each}}{{#if (gt newValue.semanticsValidation.failed 5)}}
    • ... and {{math newValue.semanticsValidation.failed '-' 5}} more failed semantic rule(s)
      • {{/if}}
    {{/if}}
{{/if}}{{#if newValue.qualityValidation}}
  • Quality Validation ({{newValue.qualityValidation.passed}}/{{newValue.qualityValidation.total}}) {{#if (eq newValue.qualityValidation.failed 0)}}‚úÖ{{else}}‚ùå{{/if}}
    {{#if (eq newValue.qualityValidation.failed 0)}}All quality expectations validated successfully.{{else}}
    • {{newValue.qualityValidation.failed}} out of {{newValue.qualityValidation.total}} ({{math (math 100 '-' newValue.qualityValidation.qualityScore) 'round' 2}}%) total test cases have Failed!{{#if entity.testSuite}} Check test results here{{/if}}.
    {{/if}}
{{/if}}{{#if entity.latestResult.message}}

‚ÑπÔ∏è Additional Information:

{{entity.latestResult.message}}
{{/if}}{{/if}}{{/each}}{{/if}}

{{else if (and (eq event.entityType 'testSuite') (hasFieldInChanges changes 'testCaseResultSummary'))}}{{#if entity.summary}}{{#if (eq entity.summary.failed 0)}}{{#if (eq entity.summary.aborted 0)}}‚úÖ Test Suite Passed{{else}}‚ö†Ô∏è Test Suite Aborted{{/if}}{{else}}‚ùå Test Suite Failed{{/if}}{{#if entity.testCaseResultSummary}}{{#each entity.testCaseResultSummary}}{{#if @last}} at {{formatDate timestamp}}{{/if}}{{/each}}{{/if}}{{/if}}

üìã Test Suite Information:
  • Name: {{entity.name}}
    • {{#if entity.basicEntityReference}}
  • Applied to {{camelCaseToTitle entity.basicEntityReference.type}}: {{entity.basicEntityReference.fullyQualifiedName}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if (gt (length entity.owners) 0)}}
  • Owners: {{#each entity.owners}}{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if (gt (length entity.reviewers) 0)}}
  • Reviewers: {{#each entity.reviewers}}{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.tags}}
  • Tags: {{#each (pluck entity.tags 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}{{#if entity.domains}}
  • Domains: {{#each entity.domains}}{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{/if}}
{{#if entity.summary}}{{#if (or (gt entity.summary.failed 0) (gt entity.summary.aborted 0))}}üî¨ Failure Investigation:
{{#if entity.testCaseResultSummary}}
    {{#with (filter entity.testCaseResultSummary status='Failed') as |failedTests|}}{{#if failedTests}}{{#if (gt (length failedTests) 0)}}
  • {{entity.summary.failed}}/{{entity.summary.total}} Failed tests ({{math (math (math entity.summary.failed '/' entity.summary.total) '*' 100) 'round' 2}}%)
      {{#each (limit failedTests 5)}}
    • {{#each (split testCaseName '.') as |part|}}{{#if @last}}{{part}}{{/if}}{{/each}}
      • {{/each}}{{#if (gt (length failedTests) 5)}}
    • ... and {{math (length failedTests) '-' 5}} more failed test(s)
      • {{/if}}
    • {{/if}}{{/if}}{{/with}}{{#with (filter entity.testCaseResultSummary status='Aborted') as |abortedTests|}}{{#if abortedTests}}{{#if (gt (length abortedTests) 0)}}
  • {{entity.summary.aborted}}/{{entity.summary.total}} Aborted tests ({{math (math (math entity.summary.aborted '/' entity.summary.total) '*' 100) 'round' 2}}%)
      {{#each (limit abortedTests 5)}}
    • {{#each (split testCaseName '.') as |part|}}{{#if @last}}{{part}}{{/if}}{{/each}}
      • {{/each}}{{#if (gt (length abortedTests) 5)}}
    • ... and {{math (length abortedTests) '-' 5}} more aborted test(s)
      • {{/if}}
    • {{/if}}{{/if}}{{/with}}
{{/if}}{{/if}}{{/if}}{{else}}{{#if changes.updates}}Changed fields:
    {{#each changes.updates}}
  • Updated {{#if (startsWith name 'columns.')}}{{#with (split name '.') as |parts|}}{{#if (endsWith name '.tags')}}tags for column {{lookup parts 1}}{{else}}{{lookup parts 2}} for column {{lookup parts 1}}{{/if}}{{/with}}{{else if (startsWith name 'extension.')}}{{#with (split name '.') as |parts|}}custom property '{{lookup parts 1}}'{{/with}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}: {{#if (or (eq name 'tags') (endsWith name '.tags'))}}{{#if oldValue}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No tags{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No tags{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'owner')}}{{#if oldValue}}{{#if oldValue.displayName}}{{oldValue.displayName}}{{else if oldValue.name}}{{oldValue.name}}{{else}}{{oldValue}}{{/if}}{{else}}No Owner{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{#if newValue.displayName}}{{newValue.displayName}}{{else if newValue.name}}{{newValue.name}}{{else}}{{newValue}}{{/if}}{{else}}No Owner{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'owners')}}{{#if oldValue}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No Owner{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No Owner{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'certification')}}{{#with (pluck oldValue) as |oldCert|}}{{#if oldCert}}{{#if oldCert.tagLabel}}{{oldCert.tagLabel.name}}{{#if oldCert.expiryDate}} (expires {{formatDate oldCert.expiryDate}}){{/if}}{{else}}{{oldCert}}{{/if}}{{else}}No Certification{{/if}}{{/with}} ‚Üí {{#with (pluck newValue) as |newCert|}}{{#if newCert}}{{#if newCert.tagLabel}}{{newCert.tagLabel.name}}{{#if newCert.expiryDate}} (expires {{formatDate newCert.expiryDate}}){{/if}}{{else}}{{newCert}}{{/if}}{{else}}No Certification{{/if}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'domain')}}{{resolveDomain oldValue}} ‚Üí {{#with (buildEntityUrl newValue.type newValue.fullyQualifiedName) as |url|}}{{resolveDomain newValue}}{{else}}{{resolveDomain newValue}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'domains')}}{{#if oldValue}}{{#each (pluck oldValue) as |domain|}}{{resolveDomain domain}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No Domain{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{#each (pluck newValue) as |domain|}}{{#with (buildEntityUrl domain.type domain.fullyQualifiedName) as |url|}}{{resolveDomain domain}}{{else}}{{resolveDomain domain}}{{/with}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No Domain{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'description')}}{{textDiff oldValue newValue}}{{else if (startsWith name 'extension.')}}{{#if oldValue}}{{oldValue}}{{else}}Not Set{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{newValue}}{{else}}Not Set{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'assets')}}{{#if oldValue}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No assets{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}No assets{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'kpiResult')}}{{#if newValue}}{{#if newValue.targetResult}}{{#with (lookup newValue.targetResult 0) as |result|}}Added Results for {{@root.entity.name}}. Target Name: {{result.name}}, Current Value: {{result.value}}, Target Met: {{result.targetMet}}{{/with}}{{else}}KpiResult {{@root.entity.name}} is updated{{/if}}{{else}}KpiResult {{@root.entity.name}} is updated{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'pipelineStatus')}}{{#if (eq @root.event.entityType 'ingestionPipeline')}}{{#if newValue}}{{#if (eq newValue.pipelineState 'success')}}‚úÖ Succeeded{{else if (eq newValue.pipelineState 'failed')}}‚ùå Failed{{else if (eq newValue.pipelineState 'running')}}üîÑ Running{{else if (eq newValue.pipelineState 'queued')}}‚è≥ Queued{{else if (eq newValue.pipelineState 'partialSuccess')}}‚ö†Ô∏è Partially Succeeded{{else}}{{newValue.pipelineState}}{{/if}} at {{formatDate newValue.timestamp}}{{else}}Ingestion Pipeline is updated{{/if}}{{else if (eq @root.event.entityType 'pipeline')}}{{#if newValue}}{{#if (eq newValue.executionStatus 'Successful')}}‚úÖ Succeeded{{else if (eq newValue.executionStatus 'Failed')}}‚ùå Failed{{else if (eq newValue.executionStatus 'Pending')}}‚è≥ Pending{{else if (eq newValue.executionStatus 'Skipped')}}‚è≠Ô∏è Skipped{{else}}{{newValue.executionStatus}}{{/if}} at {{formatDate newValue.timestamp}}{{else}}Pipeline is updated{{/if}}{{else}}{{#if oldValue}}{{oldValue}}{{else}}empty{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{newValue}}{{else}}empty{{/if}}{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'queryUsedIn')}}{{#if @root.entity.query}}for '{{@root.entity.query}}',
    {{/if}}Query Used in: {{#each (pluck oldValue) as |entity|}}{{#with (buildEntityUrl entity.type entity.fullyQualifiedName) as |url|}}{{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{else}}{{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{/with}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{else}}Not used{{/each}} ‚Üí {{#if @root.entity.query}}for '{{@root.entity.query}}',
    {{/if}}Query Used in: {{#each (pluck newValue) as |entity|}}{{#with (buildEntityUrl entity.type entity.fullyQualifiedName) as |url|}}{{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{else}}{{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{/with}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{else}}Not used{{/each}}{{else if (startsWith name 'columns.')}}{{#if (endsWith name '.description')}}{{textDiff oldValue newValue}}{{else}}{{#if oldValue}}{{oldValue}}{{else}}empty{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{newValue}}{{else}}empty{{/if}}{{/if}}{{else if (startsWith name 'customProperties.')}}{{#if oldValue}}{{oldValue}}{{else}}Not Set{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if newValue}}{{newValue}}{{else}}Not Set{{/if}}{{else}}{{#if (pluck oldValue 'displayName')}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck oldValue 'name')}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'name') as |name|}}{{name}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck oldValue 'fullyQualifiedName')}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'fullyQualifiedName') as |fqn|}}{{fqn}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}{{#if oldValue}}{{oldValue}}{{else}}empty{{/if}}{{/if}} ‚Üí {{#if (pluck newValue 'displayName')}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck newValue 'name')}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'name') as |name|}}{{name}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck newValue 'fullyQualifiedName')}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'fullyQualifiedName') as |fqn|}}{{fqn}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}{{#if newValue}}{{newValue}}{{else}}empty{{/if}}{{/if}}{{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}{{#if changes.adds}}Added fields:
    {{#each changes.adds}}
  • Added {{#if (eq name 'followers')}}follow to {{camelCaseToTitle @root.event.entityType}} {{@root.entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{else if (startsWith name 'columns.')}}{{#with (split name '.') as |parts|}}{{#if (endsWith name '.tags')}}tags to column {{lookup parts 1}}: {{#each (pluck newValue 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}{{lookup parts 2}} to column {{lookup parts 1}}: {{{newValue}}}{{/if}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'tags')}}tags: {{#each (pluck newValue 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (startsWith name 'extension.')}}{{#with (split name '.') as |parts|}}Added custom property '{{lookup parts 1}}': {{newValue}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'owner')}}owner: {{#if newValue.displayName}}{{newValue.displayName}}{{else if newValue.name}}{{newValue.name}}{{else}}{{newValue}}{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'owners')}}owners: {{#each (pluck newValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (eq name 'certification')}}certification: {{#with (pluck newValue) as |newCert|}}{{#if newCert.tagLabel}}{{newCert.tagLabel.name}}{{#if newCert.expiryDate}} (expires {{formatDate newCert.expiryDate}}){{/if}}{{else}}{{newCert}}{{/if}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'domain')}}domain: {{#with (buildEntityUrl newValue.type newValue.fullyQualifiedName) as |url|}}{{resolveDomain newValue}}{{else}}{{resolveDomain newValue}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'domains')}}domains: {{#each (pluck newValue) as |domain|}}{{#with (buildEntityUrl domain.type domain.fullyQualifiedName) as |url|}}{{resolveDomain domain}}{{else}}{{resolveDomain domain}}{{/with}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (eq name 'description')}}description: {{{newValue}}}{{else if (eq name 'queryUsedIn')}}queryUsedIn: {{#if @root.entity.query}}for '{{@root.entity.query}}',
    {{/if}}Query Used in: {{#each (pluck newValue) as |entity|}}{{#with (buildEntityUrl entity.type entity.fullyQualifiedName) as |url|}}{{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{else}}{{entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{/with}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (eq name 'assets')}}assets: {{#each (pluck newValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}{{name}}: {{#if (pluck newValue 'displayName')}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck newValue 'name')}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'name') as |name|}}{{name}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck newValue 'fullyQualifiedName')}}{{#each (pluck newValue 'fullyQualifiedName') as |fqn|}}{{fqn}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}{{newValue}}{{/if}}{{/if}}
    • {{/each}}

    {{#each changes.deletes}}
  • Deleted {{#if (eq name 'followers')}}follow to {{camelCaseToTitle @root.event.entityType}} {{@root.entity.fullyQualifiedName}}{{else if (startsWith name 'columns.')}}{{#with (split name '.') as |parts|}}{{#if (endsWith name '.tags')}}Deleted tags from column {{lookup parts 1}}: {{#each (pluck oldValue 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}Deleted {{lookup parts 2}} from column {{lookup parts 1}}: {{oldValue}}{{/if}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'tags')}}tags: {{#each (pluck oldValue 'tagFQN') as |tagFQN|}}{{tagFQN}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (startsWith name 'extension.')}}{{#with (split name '.') as |parts|}}Deleted custom property '{{lookup parts 1}}': {{oldValue}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'owner')}}owner: {{#if oldValue.displayName}}{{oldValue.displayName}}{{else if oldValue.name}}{{oldValue.name}}{{else}}{{oldValue}}{{/if}}{{else if (eq name 'owners')}}owners: {{#each (pluck oldValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (eq name 'certification')}}certification: {{#with (pluck oldValue) as |oldCert|}}{{#if oldCert.tagLabel}}{{oldCert.tagLabel.name}}{{#if oldCert.expiryDate}} (expired {{formatDate oldCert.expiryDate}}){{/if}}{{else}}{{oldCert}}{{/if}}{{/with}}{{else if (eq name 'domain')}}domain: {{resolveDomain oldValue}}{{else if (eq name 'domains')}}domains: {{#each (pluck oldValue) as |domain|}}{{resolveDomain domain}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (eq name 'description')}}description: {{oldValue}}{{else if (eq name 'queryUsedIn')}}queryUsedIn: {{#if @root.entity.query}}for '{{@root.entity.query}}',
    {{/if}}Query Used in was removed{{else if (eq name 'assets')}}assets: {{#each (pluck newValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}{{name}}: {{#if (pluck oldValue 'displayName')}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'displayName') as |displayName|}}{{displayName}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck oldValue 'name')}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'name') as |name|}}{{name}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else if (pluck oldValue 'fullyQualifiedName')}}{{#each (pluck oldValue 'fullyQualifiedName') as |fqn|}}{{fqn}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}{{else}}{{oldValue}}{{/if}}{{/if}}
